**As a**  [role name]
**I need**  [function]
**So that** [benefit]

### Assumption and Dependencies
- list any assumptions or dependencies here

### Acceptance criteria 

```gherkin
Given [some context]
When [certain action happen]
And [optional - more context]
Then [the outcome of action is observed]
````
